refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [b, a] = impinvar (b, a) [b, a] = impinvar (b, a, fs) [b, a] = impinvar (b, a, fs, tol)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This is an Octave function. This function converts analog filter with coefficients b and a to digital, conserving impulse response. This function does the inverse of impinvar.
